children.value: The story begins when Greg invited a bunch of friends for dinner. Because Greg broke his leg, Anthony picked up Mai for the meetup and then it was love at first sight. After dinner, Anthony and Mai added each other on Snapchat and the rest is history.
And then they adopted a bird but then realized anthony was allergic so then they had to give poor harvey away.

properties.title: Where are you going for your honeymoon?
